careless.\""},{"lineNumber":199303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅん……もう少し、寝かせて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm... let me sleep a little longer...\""},{"lineNumber":199304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　むにゃむにゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Munyaa munyaa...\""},{"lineNumber":199305,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスと、","translatedEnglishLine":"With Dark Lance,"},{"lineNumber":199306,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして起きてきた子達と協力して、","translatedEnglishLine":"and the children who had woken up,"},{"lineNumber":199307,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆を起こして回る。","translatedEnglishLine":"we went around waking everyone awake."},{"lineNumber":199309,"originalJapaneseLine":"　事情も大まかには把握してるな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You all roughly understand the situation, right?\""},{"lineNumber":199310,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあっ、はあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah...\""},{"lineNumber":199311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ははは、俺も辛くなってきたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haha, I'm starting to feel the strain too.\""},{"lineNumber":199312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よっし、全員で脱出するぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, everyone, let's escape together!\""},{"lineNumber":199313,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスの視線の先にあるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahead of Dark Lance's gaze was"},{"lineNumber":199314,"originalJapaneseLine":"空間にぽっかりと開いた黒い大穴。","translatedEnglishLine":"a large black hole open in the space."},{"lineNumber":199315,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやらあそこから侵入してきたらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seemed that was the point of intrusion."},{"lineNumber":199316,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはすなわち、","translatedEnglishLine":"Which meant,"},{"lineNumber":199317,"originalJapaneseLine":"あそこが出口でもあるということだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"that it was also the exit."},{"lineNumber":199318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、それなんだが、すまん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, about that... sorry..."},{"lineNumber":199319,"originalJapaneseLine":"　体が動かせそうにない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't think I can move my body.\""},{"lineNumber":199320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみません、兄さん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, brother."},{"lineNumber":199321,"originalJapaneseLine":"　僕も同様です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm in the same condition...\""},{"lineNumber":199322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう……いいと思うの……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I think... it's fine already..."},{"lineNumber":199323,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここでみんなで生きてくのも……","translatedEnglishLine":"to live here together..."},{"lineNumber":199324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぐう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Guuu...\""},{"lineNumber":199325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰か近くにいる人は深根を起こしてくれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someone nearby, please wake up Fukane...\""},{"lineNumber":199326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「深根ちゃーん、起きてー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fukane-chan, wake up!\""},{"lineNumber":199327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はは、調子が出て来たな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haha, you're getting back in shape.\""},{"lineNumber":199328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「て、ていうか、動けないのは全員じゃないの！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, are all of us unable to move!?\""},{"lineNumber":199329,"originalJapaneseLine":"　立ち上がることすらできないんだけど！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't even stand up!?"},{"lineNumber":199330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がっ、糞がぁ！　くっ、くうううう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah, damn it! Ugh, ughhh!\""},{"lineNumber":199331,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆、上半身を起こして","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone managed to lift their upper bodies"},{"lineNumber":199332,"originalJapaneseLine":"意識を覚醒させることまでは出来たが、","translatedEnglishLine":"and awaken their consciousness,"},{"lineNumber":199333,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかしそれが体を動かせる限界だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"but that was the limit of their bodily movement."},{"lineNumber":199334,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう慌てるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't panic like that."},{"lineNumber":199335,"originalJapaneseLine":"　体が重いのはクエルプランの中にある、","translatedEnglishLine":"The heaviness in your body is due to the mucus inside the Quelplan."},{"lineNumber":199336,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この粘液のせいだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's because of this slime.\""},{"lineNumber":199337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これには人の力や意思を奪う力があるらしい」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems this has the power to steal people's strength and will."},{"lineNumber":199338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃ、じゃあどうすんのさー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-so what do we do then!?\""},{"lineNumber":199339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、そう慌てるなって。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why I said, don't panic."},{"lineNumber":199340,"originalJapaneseLine":"　待ってろ、俺が今――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait here, I'll—\""},{"lineNumber":199341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph!\""},{"lineNumber":199342,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスが自分の得物である","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance thrust his weapon,"},{"lineNumber":199343,"originalJapaneseLine":"歪な形の大剣――宝剣グラムを地面に突き刺した。","translatedEnglishLine":"the oddly shaped greatsword—The Treasure Sword Gram—into the ground."},{"lineNumber":199344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――絶対に全員助けてやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will definitely save everyone!\""},{"lineNumber":199345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぶわっ！？　ななな、なんだー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bwah!? W-what is this!?\""},{"lineNumber":199346,"originalJapaneseLine":"宝剣グラムの周囲に強力な風が発生し、","translatedEnglishLine":"A powerful wind surged around the Treasure Sword Gram,"},{"lineNumber":199347,"originalJapaneseLine":"辺り一面を満たしていた粘液が","translatedEnglishLine":"and the slime that filled the surroundings"},{"lineNumber":199348,"originalJapaneseLine":"グラムへと集まっていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"began to gather toward Gram."},{"lineNumber":199349,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはまるで、意思を持つ大量の生き物が","translatedEnglishLine":"It was as if a multitude of living creatures with will"},{"lineNumber":199350,"originalJapaneseLine":"新たな獲物に群がるかのようだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"were swarming towards new prey."},{"lineNumber":199351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":199352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今までありがとうな……グラム……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you for everything so far... Gram...\""},{"lineNumber":199353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあっ！　う、動ける！　動けるぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow! I-I can move! I can move!\""},{"lineNumber":199354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、マジじゃねーか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, this is for real!\""},{"lineNumber":199355,"originalJapaneseLine":"粘液がなくなった途端、","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment the slime disappeared,"},{"lineNumber":199356,"originalJapaneseLine":"今までのことが嘘のように体が軽くなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"their bodies felt lighter as if everything until now was a lie."},{"lineNumber":199357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ！　出口まで行くぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now! Let's head to the exit!"},{"lineNumber":199358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　動ける奴は動けない奴を担げ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who can move, carry those who can't!\""},{"lineNumber":199359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「全員、走れ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone, run!\""},{"lineNumber":199360,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達はダークランスの声に合わせて、","translatedEnglishLine":"You all responded to Dark Lance's voice,"},{"lineNumber":199361,"originalJapaneseLine":"出口へ向かって駆けだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and started running toward the exit."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ、不覚だ」
「うぅん……もう少し、寝かせて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmm... let me sleep a little longer..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むにゃむにゃ……」
ダークランスと、
そして起きてきた子達と協力して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the children who had woken up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆を起こして回る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we went around waking everyone up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーし、全員起きたな。
事情も大まかには把握してるな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all roughly understand the situation, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあっ、はあ……
ははは、俺も辛くなってきたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, I'm starting to feel the strain too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっし、全員で脱出するぞ」
ダークランスの視線の先にあるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahead of Dark Lance's gaze was

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空間にぽっかりと開いた黒い大穴。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a large black hole open in the space.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやらあそこから侵入してきたらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seemed that was the point of intrusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはすなわち、
あそこが出口でもあるということだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that it was also the exit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、それなんだが、すまん……
体が動かせそうにない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't think I can move my body."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません、兄さん。
僕も同様です……」
「もう……いいと思うの……
ここでみんなで生きてくのも……
ぐう……」
「誰か近くにいる人は深根を起こしてくれ……」
「深根ちゃーん、起きてー」
「はは、調子が出て来たな」
「て、ていうか、動けないのは全員じゃないの！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-wait, are all of us unable to move!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち上がることすらできないんだけど！？」
「がっ、糞がぁ！　くっ、くうううう！」
皆、上半身を起こして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone managed to lift their upper bodies

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意識を覚醒させることまでは出来たが、
しかしそれが体を動かせる限界だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that was the limit of their bodily movement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう慌てるな。
体が重いのはクエルプランの中にある、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The heaviness in your body is due to the mucus inside the Quelplan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この粘液のせいだ」
「これには人の力や意思を奪う力があるらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems this has the power to steal people's strength and will.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃ、じゃあどうすんのさー！？」
「だから、そう慌てるなって。
待ってろ、俺が今――」
「ふんっ！」
ダークランスが自分の得物である
歪な形の大剣――宝剣グラムを地面に突き刺した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the oddly shaped greatsword—The Treasure Sword Gram—into the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――絶対に全員助けてやる！」
「ぶわっ！？　ななな、なんだー！？」
宝剣グラムの周囲に強力な風が発生し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A powerful wind surged around the Treasure Sword Gram,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辺り一面を満たしていた粘液が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the slime that filled the surroundings

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グラムへと集まっていく。
それはまるで、意思を持つ大量の生き物が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was as if a multitude of living creatures with will

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな獲物に群がるかのようだった。
「今までありがとうな……グラム……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for everything so far... Gram..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあっ！　う、動ける！　動けるぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow! I-I can move! I can move!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、マジじゃねーか！」
粘液がなくなった途端、
今までのことが嘘のように体が軽くなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their bodies felt lighter as if everything until now was a lie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ！　出口まで行くぞ！
動ける奴は動けない奴を担げ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who can move, carry those who can't!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全員、走れ！」
あなた達はダークランスの声に合わせて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all responded to Dark Lance's voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出口へ向かって駆けだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started running toward the exit.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

歪な形の大剣――宝剣グラムを地面に突き刺した。

「今までありがとうな……グラム……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for everything so far... Gram..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあっ！　う、動ける！　動けるぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow! I-I can move! I can move!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、マジじゃねーか！」
粘液がなくなった途端、
今までのことが嘘のように体が軽くなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their bodies felt lighter as if everything until now was a lie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ！　出口まで行くぞ！
動ける奴は動けない奴を担げ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who can move, carry those who can't!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全員、走れ！」
あなた達はダークランスの声に合わせて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all responded to Dark Lance's voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出口へ向かって駆けだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started running toward the exit.
